bibl.title: Ancient Letters and the New Testament. A Guide to Context and Exegesis.

author.forename: with the collaboration of Daniel P.

bibl.note: Updated English translation of: Die antike Briefliteratur und das Neue Testament. Ein Lehr- und Arbeitsbuch = Uni-Taschenbücher. 2022 (Padeborn, 1998).
KLAUCK Hans-Josef, with the collaboration of Daniel P. BAILEY, Ancient Letters and the New Testament. A Guide to Context and Exegesis.
Waco, Texas, Baylor University Press, 2006, 8°, xxxiii-504 pp., nombr. tabl. ISBN 978-1-932792-40-9. $39.95.
